    derive_outcome Calculates new outcomes by dividing (outcome1/outcome2) or subtracting (outcome1 - outcome2). If function returns NULL then no derived data are present. Any observation outcome sets that already have a result outcome associated with them are removed.

    derive_outcome.Rd

    derive_outcome Calculates new outcomes by dividing (outcome1/outcome2) or subtracting (outcome1 - outcome2). If function returns NULL then no derived data are present. Any observation outcome sets that already have a result outcome associated with them are removed.

    derive_outcome(
  Data,
  outcome_col = "Out.SubInd",
  outcome1,
  outcome2,
  outcome_result,
  operation = "subtract",
  match_fields,
  val_col1 = "MeanT",
  val_col2 = "MeanC"
)

    Arguments

    Data

    An ERA data.table (e.g. ERAg::ERA.Compiled).

    outcome_col

    Column in Data containing the outcome labels for outcome1 and outcome2

    outcome1

    Set outcome1 name for dividing (outcome1/outcome2) or subtracting (outcome1 - outcome2) outcomes

    outcome2

    Set outcome2 name for dividing (outcome1/outcome2) or subtracting (outcome1 - outcome2) outcomes

    outcome_result

    Set code of outcome to added to the Outcode field

    operation

    Choose subtract or divide

    match_fields

    Select fields within Data that can match identical observation contexts for outcome1 and outcome2

    val_col1

    Field in Data that contains value of outcome1

    val_col2

    Field in Data that contains value of outcome2

    Contents

    Developed by Peter Steward.
